result.name: Grand Canyon South Rim Tour
result.description: Prepare to be blown away while you experience one of the Seven Wonders of the Natural World with a Grand Canyon Bus Tour at the South Rim National Park. Beginning over 17 million years ago, the Colorado River began forming the Grand Canyon. Over thousands of years, the Colorado River has been cutting through the many layers of rock and sediments while raising the Colorado Plateau. The Grand Canyon measures in at 277 miles long, and up to 18 miles wide as well as attaining a depth of over a mile deep

result.description: Want to experience the glass Skywalk at the Grand Canyon? Take in the sights at 4,000 feet above the Canyon floor! result.description: Experience the Grand Canyon South Rim aboard a luxury bus tour from Las Vegas and Experience it in IMAX. result.description: Take a bus tour of Grand Canyon South Rim's National Park, experience once and a lifetime photo opportunities at multiple lookout areas. result.name: Death Valley Day Tour
result.description: Journey to the heart of Death Valley National Park as we visit the hottest, driest and lowest point in the Western Hemisphere! An array of colours and this extreme desert environment is a photographers dream! This full day tour offers spectacular highlights of Death Valley. You will be amazed at the sheer size and astounding natural features in this desolate national treasure. Breath taking photos opportunities at Zabriskie point, a stunning scenic drive through Artist’s Pallet and of course a stop at Bad Water-at 280 feet below sea level this is the lowest point in the Western Hemisphere!
